description: Superb two bedroom, two bathroom, modern high specification apartment with concierge, balcony/terrace furnished of 744 square feet. <PARA> Westminster provides a unique peaceful blend of historical elegance, modern luxury and exceptional amenities. The neighbourhood, renowned for its grand white stucco facades and quiet mews, offers a tranquil residential atmosphere while being in the heart of London. Westminster offers the excitement of central London as well as the tranquillity of secluded residential streets and green open spaces, calling Westminster home means your lifestyle has endless variety. From the world-famous shopping of nearby Bond and Oxford Street to the newly redeveloped districts of Victoria, there’s always something to see or do. The area's cultural richness is immense, with a plethora of art dealers on Pimlico Road and proximity to world-class museums like the Victoria & Albert Museum and the Natural History Museum in nearby South Kensington. While Westminster itself is a peaceful enclave, it has easy access to renowned theatres and cinemas like The Royal Court theatre on Sloane Square and Everyman Cinema in nearby Chelsea. For recreation and relaxation, residents enjoy exclusive private garden squares and many walk to the expansive green spaces of St. James’s Park and Hyde Park. Transport links are excellent, with multiple tube stations including Pimlico, St. James’s Park, Sloane Square and Victoria providing quick and easy access to the rest of London and beyond. Close by is the headquarters of John D Wood & Co on Belgrave Square and our hugely popular Elizabeth Street residential property office.

Off the reception is a fully fitted kitchen, with modern appliances included. <PARA> The property features two double bedrooms. The principal bedroom boasts a large walk-in closet, and is further enhanced by access to a balcony, which overlooks the street, offering a very pleasant spot to relax with views of the neighbourhood, and a space to really soak up the City vibe too. The second bedroom is a generous size. Built in storage is a fabulous feature of the apartment. <PARA> The modern shower room is completed to a very high standard, with a contemporary shower cubicle and sleek tiling. Residents of the building also benefit from a concierge service and lift access to each floor. <PARA> Local amenities include shopping and eating at the nearby One New Change, which is adjacent to St Paul's Cathedral. Postman's Park is a charming, historic green space with the Memorial to Heroic Self-Sacrifice being a feature. The vibrant bars, restaurants and cafes around St Paul's, the River Thames and the City's cultural landmarks are all close-by. There is also a parking space offered with the home. <PARA> Superb transport links are on your doorstep, with St Paul's Underground Station (Central Line), just moments' away. The nearby Barbican, Farringdon and Moorgate stations provide access to the Circle, Metropolitan, Hammersmith and City, Elizabeth Line and Thameslink services - so this property is extremely well connected to all areas of London, and beyond.
